title: Apex Legends Mobile is now available to download on the Google Play Store
content:
After a long wait and a number of limited region-locked beta previews, Apex Legends Mobile is now available for all Android users on the Google Play Store.

description: After a number of limited region-locked beta previews, Apex Legends Mobile is now available for all Android users on the Google Play Store.
